translations.text: Alhamdu lillaahi faatiris samaawaati wal-ardi jaa'ilil malaaa'ikati rusulan uleee ajnihatim masnaa Wa-sulaasa Wa-rubaa'; yazeedu fil khalqi maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

translations.text: Maa yaftahil laahu linnaaasi mir rahmatin falaa mumsika lahaa Wa-maa yumsik falaa mursila lahoo mim ba'dihi; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasuz kuroo ni'matal laahi alaikum; hal min khaaliqin ghairul laahi yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal-ard; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tu'fakoon

words.en: And if||they deny you||then certainly||were denied||Messengers||before you||before you||And to||Allah||return||the matters

translations.text: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablik; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu inna wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurrannakumul hayaatud dunyaa; Wa-laa yaghurran-nakum billaahil gharoor

translations.text: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhrajnaa bihee samaraatim mukhtalifan alwaanuhaa; Wa-minal jibaali judadum beedunw Wa-humrum mukhtalifun alwaanuhaa Wa-gharaabeebu sood

words.en: And they (will) say||All praises||(be) to Allah||the One Who||(has) removed||from us||the sorrow||Indeed||our Lord||(is) surely Oft-Forgiving||Most Appreciative

translations.text: Wa-qaalul hamdu lillaahil lazeee azhaba 'annal hazan; inna Rabbanaa la-Ghafoorun Shakoor

translations.text: Wallazeena kafaroo lahum naaru Jahannama laa yuqdaa alaihim fa-yamootoo Wa-laa yukhaffafu 'anhum min azaabihaa; kazaalika najzee kulla kafoor

words.id: dan mereka||mereka berteriak||di dalamnya||ya Tuhan kami||keluarkanlah kami||Kami akan mengerjakan||kebajikan/amal saleh||bukan||yang||adalah kami||kami kerjakan||ataukah tidak||Kami beri umur panjang padamu||apa||untuk mengingat/berfikir||di dalamnya||orang/siapa||mengingat/berfikir||dan datang kepadamu||seorang pemberi peringatan||maka rasakanlah||maka tidaklah||bagi orang-orang zalim||dari||seorang penolong
words.en: And they||will cry||therein||Our Lord!||Bring us out||we will do||righteous (deeds)||other than||(that) which||we used||(to) do||Did not||We give you life long enough||that||(would) receive admonition||therein||whoever||receives admonition||And came to you||the warner||So taste||then not||(is) for the wrongdoers||any||helper

translations.text: Wa-hum yastarikhoona feehaa Rabbanaa akhrijnaa na'mal saalihan ghairal lazee kunnaa na'mal; awa-lamnu ammirkum maa yatazak-karu feehi man tazakkara Wa-jaaa'akumun nazeeru fazooqoo famaa lizzaalimeena min naseer

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||mengetahui||kegaiban||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||sesungguhnya Dia||Maha Mengetahui||dengan yang ada||dalam dada/hati
words.en: Indeed||Allah||(is the) Knower||(of the) unseen||(of) the heavens||and the earth||Indeed, He||(is the) All-Knower||of what (is) in the breasts||of what (is) in the breasts

translations.text: innal laaha aalimu ghaibis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

words.id: Dia||yang||menjadikan kamu||khalifah||pada||bumi||maka barangsiapa||kafir||maka atasnya/menimpa||kekafirannya||dan tidak||menambah||orang-orang yang kafir||kekafiran mereka||disisi||Tuhan mereka||kecuali||kemurkaan||dan tidak||menambah||orang-orang yang kafir||kekafiran mereka||kecuali||kerugian
words.en: He||(is) the One Who||made you||successors||in||the earth||And whoever||disbelieves||then upon him||(is) his disbelief||And not||increase||the disbelievers||their disbelief||near||their Lord||except||(in) hatred||and not||increase||the disbelievers||their disbelief||except||(in) loss

translations.text: Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifa fil ard; faman kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo; Wa-laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum inda Rabbihim illaa maqtanw wa-laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum illaa khasaaraa

words.id: katakanlah||apakah kamu memperhatikan||sekutu-sekutumu||orang-orang yang||kamu seru||dari||selain||Allah||perlihatkanlah kepadaku||apa yang||mereka ciptakan||dari||bumi||atau||bagi mereka||sekutu/saham||di/pada||langit(jamak)||atau||Kami berikan kepada mereka||kitab||lalu mereka||atas||keterangan-keterangan||dari padanya||bahkan/tetapi||tidak||menjanjikan||orang-orang yang zalim||sebagian mereka||sebagian||kecuali||tipuan
words.en: Say||Have you seen||your partners||those whom||you call||besides||besides||Allah||Show Me||what||they have created||from||the earth||or||for them||(is) a share||in||the heavens||Or||have We given them||a Book||so they||(are) on||a clear proof||therefrom||Nay||not||promise||the wrongdoers||some of them||(to) others||except||delusion

translations.text: Qul ara'aytum shurakaaa'a-kumul lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi; aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati am aatainaahum Kitaaban fahum 'alaa baiyyinatim minh; bal ien ya'iduz zaalimoona ba-'duhum ba'dan illaa ghurooraa

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||(Dia) menahan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||bahwa||tidak lenyap||dan jika||keduanya lenyap||jika||menahan keduanya||dari||seseorang||dari||sesudah-Nya/selain Dia||sesungguhnya Dia||adalah||Maha Penyantun||Maha Pengampun
words.en: Indeed||Allah||upholds||the heavens||and the earth||lest||they cease||And if||they should cease||not||can uphold them||any||one||after Him||after Him||Indeed, He||is||Most Forbearing||Oft-Forgiving

translations.text: innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal-arda an tazoolaaa; Wa-la'in zaalataaa in amsa-kahumaa min ahadim mim ba'dih; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

words.id: dan mereka bersumpah||dengan Allah||sungguh-sungguh||sumpah mereka||bahwa jika||datang kepada mereka||pemberi peringatan||niscaya mereka adalah||lebih mendapat petunjuk||dari||salah satu||ummat-ummat||maka tatkala||datang kepada mereka||pemberi peringatan||tidak||menambah mereka||kecuali||lari
words.en: And they swore||by Allah||(the) strongest||(of) their oaths||that if||came to them||a warner||surely they would be||more guided||than||any||(of) the nations||But when||came to them||a warner||not||it increased them||but||(in) aversion

translations.text: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal umami falam-maa jaaa'ahum nazeerum maa zaadahum illaa nufooraa

words.id: karena kesombongan||pada/di||bumi||dan rencana||jelek/jahat||dan tidak||menimpa||rencana||jelek/jahat||kecuali||kepada ahlinya/yang empunya||maka tidakkah||mereka menanti-nanti||kecuali||sunnah||orang-orang terdahulu||maka tidaklah||kamu dapati||bagi sunnah||Allah||berubah||dan tidaklah||kamu dapati||bagi sunnah||Allah||menyimpang
words.en: (Due to) arrogance||in||the land||and plotting||(of) the evil||but not||encompasses||the plot||(of) the evil||except||its own people||Then do||they wait||except||(the) way||(of) the former (people)||But never||you will find||in (the) way||(of) Allah||any change||and never||you will find||in (the) way||(of) Allah||any alteration

translations.text: istikbaaran fil ardi Wa-makras sayyi'; Wa-laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u illaa bi-ahlih; fahal yanzuroona illaa sunnatal awwaleen; falan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelanw Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tahweela

words.id: ataukah tidak||mereka berjalan||pada/di||bumi||lalu mereka memperhatikan||bagaimana||adalah||akibat||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||dan adalah orang-orang itu||sangat/lebih besar||daripada mereka||kekuatan||dan tidak||adalah||Allah||untuk melemahkan-Nya||dari||sesuatu||pada/di||langit(jamak)||dan tidak||di||bumi||sesungguhnya Dia||adalah||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Kuasa
words.en: Have they not||traveled||in||the land||and seen||how||was||(the) end||(of) those who||(were) before them||(were) before them||And they were||stronger||than them||(in) power||But not||is||Allah||that can escape (from) Him||any||thing||in||the heavens||and not||in||the earth||Indeed, He||is||All-Knower||All-Powerful

translations.text: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana aaqibatul lazeena min Qablihim Wa-kaanoo ashadda minhum quwwah; Wa-maa kaanal laahu liyu'jizahoo min shai'in fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ard; innahoo kaana 'Aleeman Qadeeraa

words.id: dan jika sekiranya||mengambil/menyiksa||Allah||manusia||dengan apa/sebab||mereka perbuatan||tidak||Dia meninggalkan||atas||permukaannya/bumi||dari||makhluk/binatang melata||akan tetapi||Dia menangguhkan mereka||sampai||waktu||tertentu||maka apabila||datang||ajal/waktu mereka||maka sesungguh-Nya||Allah||adalah||dengan hamba-hamba-Nya||Maha Melihat
words.en: And if||Allah (were to) punish||Allah (were to) punish||the people||for what||they have earned||not||He would leave||on||its back||any||creature||But||He gives them respite||till||a term||appointed||And when||comes||their term||then indeed||Allah||is||of His slaves||All-Seer

translations.text: Wa-law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa min daaabbatinw Wa-laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa-izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum fa-innal laaha kaana bi'ibaadihee Baseeraa
